name: Create Airtable records from new Asana tasks
description: Use this template to grab new Asana tasks and create records with the information on Airtable automatically. This Make template uses this [Airtable](https://airtable.com/shrux2v9Q2fos9IdM/tblQuKx5nr5Azy4jT/viwBnmmkHP2jy55gW?blocks=hide) template.
